chapter.title: HowTo - Control OpenEngSB via the Karaf-Console

section.title: Goal
section.para: This tutorial shows how to use the OpenEngSB console. It further describes how to add new commands.

section.title: Time to Complete
section.para: To read this tutorial and get familiar with the first view commands should not take more than 10 minutes

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: This HowTo assumes you already have downloaded the OpenEngSB.

section.title: Start the console
section.para: It is not much needed to get the OpenEngSB console started. Just type in a shell "mvn openengsb:provision" or execute the corresponding shell script (etc/scripts/run.sh)

section.title: Available commands
section.para: This section is work in progress, which means that it will be extended every time a new command is available
